long_description: The ultra-compact Tamrac ZipShot Mini tripod weighs in at a scant 9 oz. It's easy to carry and sets up in seconds. Say goodbye to heavy, bulky tripods that take precious time to put in place. With the ZipShot Mini, simply release the 2 red shock cords and watch the tripod legs spring open and into place. Sturdy aluminum materials and a heavy-duty metal ball head support up to 3 lbs.-suitable for a DSLR with lens, point-and-shoot camera, camcorder or flash. The Tamrac ZipShot Mini tripod features a single release lever lets you position the mount at virtually any angle, making it easy to take portrait or landscape shots.
